message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm looking for $12000 for it. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, but based on my research and budget, I am only able to offer $9500 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this unique item. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my current budget, I am able to offer $10500 for the item.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still think the product is worth more than $10500. How about we say $11500? I'm getting a bit concerned that if we don't come to an agreement, I might have to consider selling to someone else. What do you think?

I understand your position, Alice. I've done some further research and believe that a fair price for the product would be $11000. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the item.

I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11200. I'm trying to make a deal, but I also need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this unique item. Can you see your way to $11200?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I've considered your proposal carefully and believe that $11000 remains a fair price for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.

I think we're really close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a complimentary service that's worth $1000. So, effectively, you'll be getting the product for $10000. What do you think?
